Nvidia users, the feb update and the beta drivers are bunk and will cause you to have a "crysis 3 exe has stopped working" after the splash.

To remedy this delete drivers, install nvidia drivers from december.

Make sure you delete this nvwgf2umx.dll file from c:/windows/system32 This showed up in event log as cause of crash. After I reinstalled old drivers I no longer crash.
